tasks.label: Docker Compose Up (DB)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow up -d sensing-flow-db

tasks.label: Docker Compose Stop (DB)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow stop sensing-flow-db

tasks.label: Docker Compose Rebuild (DB)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow up -d --build sensing-flow-db

tasks.label: Docker Compose Up (localstack)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow up -d localstack

tasks.label: Docker Compose Stop (localstack)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow stop localstack

tasks.label: Docker Compose Rebuild (localstack)
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -p sensing-flow up -d --build localstack
